Let user interviews be your guide

Nobody knows your product like you and your team.


And that's exactly why user interviews are essential. They give you an unbiased perspective on your ideas, designs, and messaging.


So you can see things with fresh eyes, spot things you'd otherwise miss, and iterate with confidence.


Your free user interviews-and insights-are waiting. Hit the button below to claim your 15-day free trial.
Get my free trial

Hassle-free user research

Your free trial of Hotjar Engage gives you:

3 interviews from the Hotjar participant pool. Includes €20 compensation per user and access to over 200,000+ diverse participants.

10 interviews with users from your own network. Use our platform to connect with your own users (compensation not included).

Multiplayer. Invite 2 co-moderators and up to 4 hidden spectators to your interviews.

Automatic scheduling. Choose when you're free and Engage will handle the rest.

Automatic call recording and transcription. For easy access to insights.

Get user insights in hours, not weeks. Give user interviews a go today.
Get my free trial
